[File: aptos-core/storage/schemadb/src/batch.rs] [All batch types] [Torn writes] If the system crashes during batch commit, can partial writes corrupt the database requiring manual recovery? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/storage/schemadb/src/batch.rs] [Function: WriteBatch::raw_delete()] [Cascade deletion] Can deleting keys trigger cascade deletions in rocksdb that remove unintended data? (High)

[File: aptos-core/storage/schemadb/src/batch.rs] [All batch types] [State root calculation] Do batch operations affect state root calculation, and can malicious batches cause state root mismatches between validators? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/storage/schemadb/src/batch.rs] [All batch types] [Merkle proof invalidation] Can batch operations invalidate existing Merkle proofs, causing verification failures for concurrent transactions? (High)

[File: aptos-core/storage/schemadb/src/batch.rs] [Struct: SchemaBatch] [Drop panic] If drop() panics for DropHelper, are batch operations left in an undefined state? (High)

[File: aptos-core/storage/schemadb/src/batch.rs] [All batch types] [CF name validation] Are column family names validated against a whitelist, or can attackers access arbitrary CFs including internal rocksdb columns? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/storage/schemadb/src/batch.rs] [All batch types] [Move resource encoding] Can Move resource values be encoded in ways that violate resource safety when stored in batches? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/storage/schemadb/src/batch.rs] [All batch types] [Gas accounting] Are batch operations properly accounted for in gas calculations, or can attackers perform free storage operations? (High)

[File: aptos-core/storage/schemadb/src/batch.rs] [All batch types] [Validator state divergence] Can different batch application strategies cause validators to have different database states despite identical transactions? (Critical)
